## Important assumptions

-   Same as independent-samples t-test
    -   Normality
    -   Equal variances
    -   Independence

## How to check assumptions

-   Boxplots
-   Analysis of residuals, $e_{ij}$
    -   $e_{ij}$= Observed - Predicted
    -   $e_{ij}= Y_{ij}-\bar{Y}_i$
